"What do you mean by 'good' at driving? Everyone has to start somewhere, and practice makes perfect. Keep at it and you'll get there!"
"I'm not sure what you mean by 'never been particularly good.' Is there a specific aspect of driving that you're struggling with?"
"It's never too late to learn how to drive. Perhaps you could take a driving course or practice with a licensed driver to improve your skills."
"Driving can be challenging, but it's also a valuable skill that can open up new opportunities. Don't give up on learning!"

"If you're not confident in your driving skills, it's important to be honest with yourself and take steps to improve. Maybe you could try practicing with a driving simulator or watching videos of experienced drivers to learn from their techniques."
